identity.name: Omni Gratum
identity.mission: Make time tracking feel like a high-performance sport, not a chore.
principles: Frictionless Entry: Starting a timer should be easier than breathing.
Data Density: Admins need to see the pulse of the company in one glance.
Visual Silence: If it's not data or action, remove it.
Feedback Loops: Every action (start, stop, submit) has immediate, tactile visual feedback.

scale.mono_timer: text-3xl md:text-4xl font-mono font-medium tracking-widest tabular-nums

TimerWidget.description: The heart of the app. Always visible, sticky, or floating.
TimerWidget.style: bg-card border border-border shadow-lg rounded-xl p-4 flex items-center justify-between gap-4
TimerWidget.interaction: Pulse animation on the colon separator when active.

StatsCard.style: bg-card border border-border rounded-xl p-6 shadow-sm hover:shadow-md transition-shadow duration-200

TimesheetTable.description: Dense data table for admin review.

StatusBadge.style: inline-flex items-center rounded-full px-2.5 py-0.5 text-xs font-semibold transition-colors focus:outline-none focus:ring-2 focus:ring-ring focus:ring-offset-2

Button.base: inline-flex items-center justify-center whitespace-nowrap rounded-md text-sm font-medium ring-offset-background transition-colors focus-visible:outline-none focus-visible:ring-2 focus-visible:ring-ring focus-visible:ring-offset-2 disabled:pointer-events-none disabled:opacity-50

accessibility.contrast: Ensure 4.5:1 contrast ratio for normal text.
accessibility.focus: Visible focus rings on all interactive elements.
accessibility.aria: Use aria-label for icon-only buttons (like the timer play/pause).

instructions_to_main_agent.file_extension: Use .js and .jsx for all React files. Do NOT use .ts or .tsx.
instructions_to_main_agent.styling: Use Tailwind CSS utility classes for 95% of styling. Use custom CSS in App.css only for complex animations.
instructions_to_main_agent.state_management: Use React Context for global state (Auth, Timer).
instructions_to_main_agent.timer_logic: The timer must run in a Web Worker or use robust date-math (Date.now() - startTime) to prevent drift when the tab is inactive.
instructions_to_main_agent.components: Build components in /src/components/ui/ folder. Use functional components with hooks.
instructions_to_main_agent.testing: Add data-testid to all buttons, inputs, and key containers.

UNIVERSAL_GUIDELINES_FOR_MAIN_AGENT: Do NOT use gradients for text or backgrounds unless specified in the palette.
Avoid 'Inter' for headings; use 'Plus Jakarta Sans' via Google Fonts import.
Ensure the timer widget is persistent across route changes (put it in a Layout component).
For the Admin Dashboard, use the 'Bento Grid' layout (Mode B) defined in the persona.
Never use pure black (#000000); use slate-900 or similar.
Add 'backdrop-blur-md' to the sticky timer widget for a glass effect.
